</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns an array containing the names and values of environmental variables that can be used in simple expressions when configuring sounds.

</value></part><part><name>p1 </name>=<value> position: [[Position]].
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>["controllerA", valueA], ["controllerB", valueB], ...]
</value></part><part><name>x1 </name>=<value> <code>[[getAllEnvSoundControllers]] [[position]] [[player]];</code>
<ext><name>pre</name><attr/><inner>Result:

</inner><close></pre></close></ext>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>

rain, night, wind, daytime, meadows, trees, houses, forest, sea, coast, altitudeGround. alititudeSea, shooting, deadbody and fog
